item.title: Becoming one with the ETC.
item.description: We need ChimeraX Recently a popular hashtag in the structural biology community went around of #weneedchimeraX which to be clear, we definitely do. Funding was not looking good for the team was that was behind the incredibly powerful and importantly free tool ChimeraX. This also marked the start of the ChimeraX team’s journey into science twitter. One of their early tweets showed off the ability to generate a very cool animation using the morph functionalities and some nice graphical rendering.
